description:
exp/terminal: fix parallel builds (Makefile tweak)

The deps.bash script isn't very robust at extracting Go-source
filenames so we make sure they are on lines by themselves.
Without this change exp/terminal/util.go doesn't have
dependency generation done and is built before syscall (which
it depends on) breaking the build.
subject: exp/terminal: fix parallel builds (Makefile tweak)
